entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
